author: Ja Kub
comment: Great app, work like magic! Please add option to change the background on selection menu (transparent option would be perfect). Apps in two rows and filter by recent used would be great
title: Moto X + Moto 360

author: Robert Crockett
comment: Such an important app for me to easily start listening when my phone is in my pocket or hard to access.
title: Perfect

author: Gagik Amaryan
comment: Just launches Apple Music, doesn't play anything, annoying
title: Worked well, but please add Apple Music support

author: Richard Neilson
comment: This is wonderful. Now I can start Spotify and Pocket Casts straight from my watch, ready to play or browse. Thank you!

author: Andrew Nguyen
comment: I happen to have a bug in which two instances of soundcloud appears but otherwise works flawlessly! also wish we could customize the icon, the checker is a bit of an eyesore

reply.author: Rory Glynn
reply.content: Hey Andrew, I found a work-around for the two soundclouds problem. I'm open to suggestions on the icon front :D

title: works wonderfully

author: Ryan Joseph
comment: It works perfectly! I was going crazy trying to find a reliable way to start Pocket Casts playback from the watch and this is it. It works on the first try every time. Thanks!
title: Thanks for this!

author: Frederick Yeung
comment: I've actually wanted something like this since I've gotten my Moto 360. I couldn't believe I stumbled upon this app! Now I can't start playing music from any of my music app without talking to my watch or touching my phone.
title: Perfect!

author: Joshua Vogel
comment: THANK YOU!  I've been looking for this functionality since I got my watch.  This is a huge help.
title: Finally a way to start Audible from my watch!

author: Pradaman Shorey
comment: I can confirm that it worked for Shuttle+ & Saavn as well. Works like a charm..

reply.author: Rory Glynn
reply.content: That's great! Thanks for letting me know!

title: Fantastic

author: Ramon Guerrero
comment: Seriously, Why isn't this a standard feature in wear? Either way, good job. Works perfectly.

author: John Sargent
comment: Same job with out a 4 day trial.
title: Better than many

reply.author: Rory Glynn
reply.content: Hi Tristan, how well Playback Starter works varies from app to app. Could you please update your review to say what apps you were trying to use it with?
